description: This dataset is a combined directory of the New York State Unified Certification Program (NYSUCP).  Firms certified as Disadvantaged Business Enterprises (DBEs) by the New York State Department of Transportation, Metropolitan Transportation Authority, Niagara Frontier Transportation Authority and Port Authority of New York New Jersey are included in this dataset.

metadata.attribution: New York State Department of Transportation

name: Certified Disadvantaged Business Enterprises (DBEs) in the NYS Unified Certification Program
